subject: Christmas free shipping
description_text:
Hello,

[Image]


I saw this avertissement on facebook about christmas discount with free shipping but when i try to order the shipping are not free (See screenshots)



What is the issue ? How to get free shipping like it's say on the ad ?

Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi H YH,    Free shipping applies to orders over $399. You may use our Christmas discount code: CRSM30

Hello,

Please read the adversting i shared, it's said "unlock 30$ off over 199$ + free shipping!"

Not free shipping over 399$

Is that false adversting ?

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
